text.en: {{bold('Full-Stack Developer')}} (2019–present) specializing in {{bold('high-load microservices')}} and modern frontend development. Proven ability to {{bold('design scalable architectures, optimize performance, and deliver engaging UIs')}}. Passionate about {{bold('building systems that handle millions of users reliably')}}.

items.en: {{bold('Back-End Development')}}: {{bold('TypeScript/JavaScript')}}, {{bold('NestJS')}}, Express.js, HTTP API, WebSocket, SSE, {{bold('MongoDB')}}, {{bold('PostgreSQL')}}, MSSQL, {{bold('Redis')}}, {{bold('Kafka')}}, {{bold('RabbitMQ')}}, BullMQ.

{{bold('Front-End Development')}}: {{bold('React')}}, react-native, {{bold('MobX')}}, {{bold('zustand')}}, Ant Design, MUI, TailwindCSS, HTTP API, WebSocket, SSE, react-router, react-query, react-hook-form, react-spring, usehooks.
{{bold('Others')}}: Cloudflare, {{bold('Git')}}, GitLab CI, {{bold('Docker')}}, {{bold('docker-compose')}}, Nginx, Linux.

text.en: {{bold('Project Objective')}}: Apply {{bold('microservices')}} to build a {{bold('scalable and high-performance online gaming platform')}}, integrating third-party games, supporting online payments, and providing {{bold('stable operations for a large user base')}}.
{{bold('Technologies Used')}}: TypeScript, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Docker.

items.en: Collaborated with stakeholders to define business requirements and translate them into {{bold('robust backend API designs')}} and {{bold('database schemas')}}.
Designed and implemented a {{bold('DDD high-load microservices')}} backend architecture to {{bold('handle large volumes of concurrent users')}}.
Created multi-stage Docker images for various services to support CI/CD workflows.
Monitored backend performance; optimized query speed through PostgreSQL indexing and implemented batch inserts to improve write throughput.
Applied backend performance enhancements; implemented rate limiting and Cloudflare protections to mitigate bot traffic and prevent DDoS attacks.
Participated in incident response and bug fixing during live operations.

text.en: {{bold('Technologies Used')}}: TypeScript, ReactJS (with Vite), React Router, React Hook Form, HTTP API, WebSocket, SSE, zustand, TailwindCSS, react-spring, usehooks.

items.en: Integrated UI components with {{bold('backend APIs')}}, ensuring seamless data flow and full application functionality.
Implemented real-time features using {{bold('WebSocket and Server-Sent Events (SSE)')}}, significantly enhancing user engagement and responsiveness.
Developed a highly {{bold('responsive')}} and navigable user interface using ReactJS and react-router, styled with TailwindCSS for consistent and adaptable layouts across various screen sizes.
Streamlined form handling and improved data validation through the implementation of react-hook-form, leading to a more efficient and error-free user input process.
{{bold('Managed application state')}} effectively using zustand, contributing to improved performance and simplified component logic.
Enhanced user experience through the integration of smooth and engaging animations using react-spring.

Successfully built and operated a scalable online gaming platform with {{bold('80,000 active users')}} and a peak {{bold('CCU of ~1,500')}}, capable of handling up to {{bold('6,000 requests per second')}}.

Achieved {{bold('95% of requests responding under 200ms')}} through backend performance optimizations such as PostgreSQL indexing, batch inserts, and application-level as well as Cloudflare rate limiting to mitigate bot traffic and DDoS attacks.
Delivered a {{bold('secure, responsive, and user-friendly UI/UX')}} with {{bold('real-time updates')}} powered by {{bold('WebSocket and SSE')}}, ensuring seamless integration with backend systems.
Enhanced user engagement and responsiveness through smooth animations, efficient form handling, and optimized application state management.
Provided a fully integrated and interactive cross-device experience, combining high-performance backend architecture with a modern, intuitive front-end.

text.en: {{bold('Bachelor of Software Engineering')}} @ Thai Nguyen University (2018–2021)
